title: ‘I’m Done with Learning, It’s Time to Win’: Classics Star Megan Jastrab in a Hurry for Success in 2025
content:
Rising US star wants to regain her momentum after an injury-marred 2024 season: 'I want to be at the front of bike races.'

Read the full article at ‘I’m Done with Learning, It’s Time to Win’: Classics Star Megan Jastrab in a Hurry for Success in 2025 on Velo.
author: sstokes
